sql.query: SELECT `COUNTRY_ID` COUNTRY_ID, `COUNTRY_ISO_CODE` COUNTRY_ISO_CODE, `COUNTRY_NAME` COUNTRY_NAME, `COUNTRY_SUBREGION` COUNTRY_SUBREGION, `COUNTRY_SUBREGION_ID` COUNTRY_SUBREGION_ID, `COUNTRY_REGION` COUNTRY_REGION, `COUNTRY_REGION_ID` COUNTRY_REGION_ID, `COUNTRY_TOTAL` COUNTRY_TOTAL, `COUNTRY_TOTAL_ID` COUNTRY_TOTAL_ID, `COUNTRY_NAME_HIST` COUNTRY_NAME_HIST FROM `countries`

SELECT `CUST_ID` CUST_ID, `CUST_FIRST_NAME` CUST_FIRST_NAME, `CUST_LAST_NAME` CUST_LAST_NAME, `CUST_GENDER` CUST_GENDER, `CUST_YEAR_OF_BIRTH` CUST_YEAR_OF_BIRTH, `CUST_MARITAL_STATUS` CUST_MARITAL_STATUS, `CUST_STREET_ADDRESS` CUST_STREET_ADDRESS, `CUST_POSTAL_CODE` CUST_POSTAL_CODE, `CUST_CITY` CUST_CITY, `CUST_CITY_ID` CUST_CITY_ID, `CUST_STATE_PROVINCE` CUST_STATE_PROVINCE, `CUST_STATE_PROVINCE_ID` CUST_STATE_PROVINCE_ID, `COUNTRY_ID` COUNTRY_ID, `CUST_MAIN_PHONE_NUMBER` CUST_MAIN_PHONE_NUMBER, `CUST_INCOME_LEVEL_DIM` CUST_INCOME_LEVEL_DIM, `CUST_CREDIT_LIMIT` CUST_CREDIT_LIMIT, `CUST_EMAIL` CUST_EMAIL, `CUST_TOTAL` CUST_TOTAL, `CUST_TOTAL_ID` CUST_TOTAL_ID, `CUST_SRC_ID` CUST_SRC_ID, `CUST_EFF_FROM` CUST_EFF_FROM, `CUST_EFF_TO` CUST_EFF_TO, `CUST_VALID` CUST_VALID, `COUNTY` COUNTY FROM `customers`
SELECT `PROD_LINE_ID` PROD_LINE_ID, `CATEGORY_ID` CATEGORY_ID, `CATEGORY` CATEGORY, `SUBCATEGORY_ID` SUBCATEGORY_ID, `SUBCATEGORY` SUBCATEGORY FROM `product_line`

SELECT `PROD_ID` PROD_ID, `PROD_NAME` PROD_NAME, `PROD_DESC` PROD_DESC, `PROD_SUBCATEGORY` PROD_SUBCATEGORY, `PROD_SUBCATEGORY_ID` PROD_SUBCATEGORY_ID, `PROD_SUBCATEGORY_DESC` PROD_SUBCATEGORY_DESC, `PROD_CATEGORY` PROD_CATEGORY, `PROD_CATEGORY_ID` PROD_CATEGORY_ID, `PROD_CATEGORY_DESC` PROD_CATEGORY_DESC, `PROD_WEIGHT_CLASS` PROD_WEIGHT_CLASS, `PROD_UNIT_OF_MEASURE` PROD_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, `PROD_PACK_SIZE` PROD_PACK_SIZE, `SUPPLIER_ID` SUPPLIER_ID, `PROD_STATUS` PROD_STATUS, `PROD_LIST_PRICE` PROD_LIST_PRICE, `PROD_MIN_PRICE` PROD_MIN_PRICE, `PROD_TOTAL` PROD_TOTAL, `PROD_TOTAL_ID` PROD_TOTAL_ID, `PROD_SRC_ID` PROD_SRC_ID, `PROD_EFF_FROM` PROD_EFF_FROM, `PROD_VALID` PROD_VALID, `PROD_COST` PROD_COST, `PROD_EFF_TO` PROD_EFF_TO, `PROD_LINE_ID` PROD_LINE_ID FROM `products`

SELECT `QUANTITY_SOLD` QUANTITY_SOLD, `AMOUNT_SOLD` AMOUNT_SOLD, `CALENDAR_MONTH_NUMBER` CALENDAR_MONTH_NUMBER, `CALENDAR_QUARTER_NUMBER` CALENDAR_QUARTER_NUMBER, `CALENDAR_YEAR` CALENDAR_YEAR, `COST_OF_GOODS` COST_OF_GOODS, `PROD_ID` PROD_ID, `CUSTOMER_ID` CUSTOMER_ID, `TIME_ID` TIME_ID, `ZIPCODE` ZIPCODE FROM `sales`
